87 Crowdstrike Outage 🖥️⚠️

Jul 30, 2024

  • civictech
  • episode
  • news
  • crowdstrike
  • incident

Our host Ryan Koch gives a quick briefing about the Crowdstrike outage. We talk about why you should care about it, what happened, as well as a couple of lessons we can take from the event.
